import React from "react"; import "../Styles/"; const About = () => { return (
{/* =============================== PAGE HEADER ================================ */}

About SkyReti Educore

Empowering education, institutions, and innovators through intelligent digital solutions.

{/* =============================== COMPANY OVERVIEW ================================ */}

Who We Are

SkyReti Educore is an AI-powered education and institutional management platform designed to modernize how schools, universities, and organizations operate.

We bridge the gap between technology and education by delivering secure, scalable, and intelligent digital ecosystems that improve efficiency, transparency, and learning outcomes.

{/* =============================== MOTIVE & VISION ================================ */}

Our Motive

To simplify institutional operations and enhance learning experiences using technology that is reliable, future-ready, and accessible to all.

Our Vision

To become India’s most trusted global education-technology platform, empowering institutions with AI-driven intelligence and data-centric decision making.

{/* =============================== SOLUTION PHILOSOPHY ================================ */}

Our Solutions Philosophy

SkyReti Educore solutions are designed with a single principle: real problems deserve real solutions.

  • ✔ Secure & scalable infrastructure
  • ✔ AI-driven insights & analytics
  • ✔ Modular systems for schools & universities
  • ✔ Easy adoption with minimal training
{/* =============================== FOUNDER SECTION ================================ */}

Founder & Leadership

{/* Founder Photo */}
NR

Nitesh Raj

Founder & Product Architect

{/* Founder Message */}

“SkyReti Educore was founded with a clear mission — to remove operational complexity from education and empower institutions with technology that actually works.”

“Our focus is not just software, but impact — helping educators, administrators, and students achieve more with confidence and clarity.”

{/* =============================== TRUSTED REVIEWS ================================ */}

Trusted by Leading Institutions

DAV Public School, Delhi

— Principal

“SkyReti Educore has transformed how we manage academics and administration. The system is reliable, secure, and extremely easy for staff and parents to use.”

Marwadi University, Rajkot

— Registrar

“The platform brings clarity, automation, and data-driven decision making to university-level operations. A valuable digital partner.”

RK University

— Administration

“SkyReti Educore helped us streamline multiple departments into one unified digital system with excellent support.”

St. Xavier’s School

— Management

“A modern solution that aligns perfectly with today’s educational needs. Students, teachers, and parents all benefit.”

{/* =============================== CLOSING STATEMENT ================================ */}

Growing Together

At SkyReti Educore, we believe education is the foundation of progress. We are proud to collaborate with institutions that share our commitment to excellence, innovation, and integrity.

); }; export default About;
